metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000211 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Doorkeeper version 4.2.0 and later contains a Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in Token revocation API's authorized method that can result in Access tokens are not revoked for public OAuth apps, leaking access until expiry.

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-1').
